title: Trump Credit Card Cap Would Hit $70 Billion Market for the Debt
description: A proposed ceiling on credit card interest rates would deal a heavy blow to the $70 billion market that bundles the debt into bonds, according to analysts, even as investors shrug off the likelihood any actual policy comes to pass.
content: A proposed ceiling on credit card interest rates would deal a heavy blow to the $70 billion market that bundles the debt into bonds, according to analysts, even as investors shrug off the likelihood any actual policy comes to pass.
